humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the report, there are no metastatic carcinomas found in the sentinel lymph nodes on both the left and right sides (2 nodes on the left and 4 nodes on the right). This is supported by the statements 'both containing blue dye, are negative for metastatic carcinoma' for the left side and 'are negative for tumor' for the right side. Therefore, based on the new rules 10 and 11, the N stage for this patient is N0.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that there is no metastasis to the sentinel lymph nodes for either the left or right axilla. Specifically, the left axillary sentinel lymph nodes (2 nodes) are negative for metastatic carcinoma (AJCC pNO (i-)), and the right axillary sentinel lymph nodes (4 nodes) are also negative for tumor (AJCC pN0) (i-). Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N0.
